C

CIserver - package CIserver
Small Continuous Integration server for GitHub using webhooks

execute(String, File) - Static method in class CIserver.Execution
Function to execute a command and write the output of the command in a file
execute(String, File, File) - Static method in class CIserver.Execution
Function to execute a command and write the output of the command in a file
executeTest() - Method in class ExecutionTest
Test cases of the execute method from the class Execution First test - try to execute the command 'ls' which should work and return 0 as exit code Second test - try to execute the command 'ls monkey' which should result in an error (the monkey directory doesn't exist) and return 2 as exit code Third test - try to execute the command 'ls' in the directory 'src/' which should work and return 0 as exit code (The output of both commands is stored in 'history/test/test.txt')
Execution - Class in CIserver
The class Execution implements the functionality to execute the 'pull' and 'test' command and write it to a file
Execution() - Constructor for class CIserver.Execution
 
ExecutionTest - Class in <Unnamed>
The class ExecutionTest provides test cases for the class Execution
ExecutionTest() - Constructor for class ExecutionTest
